text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Reservation not found at check-in | Instructions: 1. Call Supplier, 2. If unconfirmed by the Supplier in 20 minutes, 3. Create a Voucher and Rebook (if current hotel has inventory) or Relocate by Booking at a near by hotel. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in they are lowering the number of nights they will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 5. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 5. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 6. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. NO SLACK FOR FUTURE DATES. | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: NONE | Supervisor: Yes

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Incorrect guest name or modifying name | Instructions: If Name: Call the hotel and ask them to "add" the name (not to change the name), 2. If the hotel refuses then call the supplier and ask them to change it. 3. If the supplier is unable please go back to the phone and let the guest know you will rebook them under the correct name. 4. If they agree, create a voucher and rebook them under their preferred name. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 5. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 6. text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Incorrect dates or modifying dates | Instructions: If the issue is the dates: (Prepaid) 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct dates. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in the client is lowering the number of nights the client will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for the dates to be changed, if the hotel agrees note the request accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the confirmation number, and the email of the front desk. 2. Let the guest know their requested change is completed. 3. If the hotel declines the modification, check the website to confirm we have availability, advise the guest that you will need to request cancellation to rebook them, go back to the hotel, obtain FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred hotel or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. NO SLACK FOR FUTURE DATES. | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: NONE | Supervisor: No

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Incorrect number of guests or modifying guest count | Instructions: If the property is in the USA and not a resort: Call the front desk and have the reservation updated for the correct number of guests. If the hotel property is outside the USA or is a resort: 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct occupancy. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for the occupancy to be changed, if the hotel agrees note the request accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the confirmation number, and the email of the front desk. 2. Let the guest know their requested change is completed. 3. If the hotel declines the modification, check the website to confirm we have availability, advise the guest that you will need to request cancellation to rebook them, go back to the hotel, obtain FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred hotel or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. IF THE RESERVATION IS MORE YOU WILL ASK THE GUEST TO PAY THE DIFFERNCE AND OPEN A TICKET FOR SUPERVISOR REVIEW. OCCUPANCY ERROR FROM SALES AGENTS WILL BE REFUNDED TO THE GUEST; PLEASE ADVISE THE GUEST OF THIS AND LET THEM KNOW IT WILL BE REVIEWED IN 1-2 BUSINESS DAYS. IF THE GUEST REFUSES TO PAY THE DIFFERENCE THEN YOU WILL NEED TO NOTIFY ON YOUR ON SHIFT SUPERVISOR SO THEY CAN GET A VOUCHER FROM US TO PAY THE DIFFERENCE. THIS IS FOR SITE ERRORS AND SALES AGENT ERRORS THAT WE CAN SUPPORT THE DIFFERENCE IN COST. | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. NO SLACK FOR FUTURE DATES. | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: NONE | Supervisor: YES

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Room type, Bed type or accessibility features not honored or Modifying Room Request | Instructions: 1. Call the hotel and ask them to move the guest to the appropriate room or requested room type 2. If the hotel refuses to do the change complimentary then ask them how much the upgrade or room change will cost. text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Discrepanies from booking refundable vs. non-refundable | Instructions: (Prepaid) 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct policy. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in the client is lowering the number of nights the client will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred policy or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. 6. text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Cancelling Non Refundable | Instructions: If a guest is requesting to cancel a non refundable room type (reasons why we would process are agent error, hotel closure or unable to accept the guest, unpredictable or dangerous weather conditions, death, flight cancellations, medical, emergencies, gesture of goodwill due to the hotel's exception). 1. Check to see if the reservation has RPP, if yes offer to email the claim link to the client or the guest can receive 100% voucher immediately. If the guest denies the voucher please reach out to the hotel to see if we can obtain a waiver. 2. Call the hotel and request FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. If you are unable to obtain FOC, ask the hotel for a waiver minus one night (for multi nights), if it's still denied then we can offer the guest the option to add a name so a friend or family member can use the room. If none of these options are acceptable we would offer 100% voucher or 50% refund. Make sure the guest is aware the hotel is denying the refund in case they would like to contact the hotel directly for a full waiver. If you do obtain FOC then note the request accurately and completely. Then process a refund via the Refund Queue for the amount you were able to get waived. Advise the guest of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). Do not refund the RPP. | Slack​: NO | Refund Queue: YES - when applicable | Create a Ticket: NONE | Supervisor: NO

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Reservation not found at check-in | Instructions: 1. Call Supplier, 2. If unconfirmed by the Supplier in 20 minutes, 3. Create a Voucher and Rebook (if current hotel has inventory) or Relocate by Booking at a near by hotel. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in they are lowering the number of nights they will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 5. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 5. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 6. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. NO SLACK FOR FUTURE DATES. | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: No | Supervisor: Yes

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Incorrect dates or modifying dates | Instructions: If the issue is the dates: (Prepaid) 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct dates. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in the client is lowering the number of nights the client will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for the dates to be changed, if the hotel agrees note the request accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the confirmation number, and the email of the front desk. 2. Let the guest know their requested change is completed. 3. If the hotel declines the modification, check the website to confirm we have availability, advise the guest that you will need to request cancellation to rebook them, go back to the hotel, obtain FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred hotel or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. NO SLACK FOR FUTURE DATES. | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: No | Supervisor: No

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Incorrect number of guests or modifying guest count | Instructions: If the property is in the USA and not a resort: Call the front desk and have the reservation updated for the correct number of guests. If the hotel property is outside the USA or is a resort: 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct occupancy. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for the occupancy to be changed, if the hotel agrees note the request accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the confirmation number, and the email of the front desk. 2. Let the guest know their requested change is completed. 3. If the hotel declines the modification, check the website to confirm we have availability, advise the guest that you will need to request cancellation to rebook them, go back to the hotel, obtain FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred hotel or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. IF THE RESERVATION IS MORE YOU WILL ASK THE GUEST TO PAY THE DIFFERNCE AND OPEN A TICKET FOR SUPERVISOR REVIEW. OCCUPANCY ERROR FROM SALES AGENTS WILL BE REFUNDED TO THE GUEST; PLEASE ADVISE THE GUEST OF THIS AND LET THEM KNOW IT WILL BE REVIEWED IN 1-2 BUSINESS DAYS. IF THE GUEST REFUSES TO PAY THE DIFFERENCE THEN YOU WILL NEED TO NOTIFY ON YOUR ON SHIFT SUPERVISOR SO THEY CAN GET A VOUCHER FROM US TO PAY THE DIFFERENCE. THIS IS FOR SITE ERRORS AND SALES AGENT ERRORS THAT WE CAN SUPPORT THE DIFFERENCE IN COST. | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. NO SLACK FOR FUTURE DATES. | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: NO | Supervisor: YES

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Room type, Bed type or accessibility features not honored or Modifying Room Request | Instructions: 1. Call the hotel and ask them to move the guest to the appropriate room or requested room type 2. If the hotel refuses to do the change complimentary then ask them how much the upgrade or room change will cost. If the hotel agrees to charge a fee or the upgrade then advise the guest to pay the charge upon arrival. Ask the guest to email the receipt of the charge to Reservations@HotelPlanner.com for reimbursement. 3. If the hotel refuses all changes and requires a new reservation, confirm with the front desk the property has availabitlity if we rebook the guest for the correct room type, once the hotel confirms they do, request a cancellation on the existing room for FOC to rebook the guest, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Advise the guest you will rebook them for the correct room if the guest agrees, create a voucher and rebook them for their preferred room type. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 6. If the guest declines support then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 7. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise them of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). | Slack​: Yes - Only for same day check in's. text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Payment declined at check-in despite prepayment | Instructions: 1. Call Supplier, 2. If unpaid by the Supplier in 20 minutes 3. Create a Voucher and Rebook (if current hotel has inventory) or Relocate by Booking at a near by hotel. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in they are lowering the number of nights they will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 5. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 5. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 6. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). EXCEPTION IS DERBYSOFT ** INSTEAD OF CALLING THE SUPPLIER** ASK THE CHANNEL MANAGER FOR THE VIRTUAL CARD. IF NOT PROVIDED IN 20 MINUTES; MOVE FORWARD WITH REBOOKING THE GUEST. | Slack​: YES | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: NO | Supervisor: NO

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Discrepanies from booking refundable vs. non-refundable | Instructions: (Prepaid) 1. Create a voucher via the refund queue and rebook the guest for the correct policy. ** Do your best to upgrade the client's room type to use full voucher value for their new reservation** The exception would be in the client is lowering the number of nights the client will expect a refund of the unused night(s). If there are any unused funds; Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). 2. After the guest has their new reservation and confirmation let them go and place yourself on DND. 3. Call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Process a refund via the queue for the client and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). (Pay at Hotel) 1. Call the hotel, ask for FOC from the hotel, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 4. Rebook the client for their perferred policy or near by hotel if inventory is not available. 5. Complete the reservation, confirm the guest has received their confirmation and note the orginial booking with the new itinerary. 6. If the guest declines support and requests a refund; then call the hotel and obtain FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property and provide it to the guest to request a free cancellation. | Slack​: NO | Refund Queue: YES - for a voucher if rebooking | Create a Ticket: NO | Supervisor: NO

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Cancelling Non Refundable | Instructions: If a guest is requesting to cancel a non refundable room type (reasons why we would process are agent error, hotel closure or unable to accept the guest, unpredictable or dangerous weather conditions, death, flight cancellations, medical, emergencies, gesture of goodwill due to the hotel's exception). 1. Check to see if the reservation has RPP, if yes offer to email the claim link to the client or the guest can receive 100% voucher immediately. If the guest denies the voucher please reach out to the hotel to see if we can obtain a waiver. 2. Call the hotel and request FOC, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. If you are unable to obtain FOC, ask the hotel for a waiver minus one night (for multi nights), if it's still denied then we can offer the guest the option to add a name so a friend or family member can use the room. If none of these options are acceptable we would offer 100% voucher or 50% refund. Make sure the guest is aware the hotel is denying the refund in case they would like to contact the hotel directly for a full waiver. If you do obtain FOC then note the request accurately and completely. Then process a refund via the Refund Queue for the amount you were able to get waived. Advise the guest of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). Do not refund the RPP. | Slack​: NO | Refund Queue: YES - when applicable | Create a Ticket: NO | Supervisor: NO

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Early departure after check in | Instructions: 1. Ask the guest if the guest notified the property or received approval from the property for early departure. If the guest has a hotel staff name please note it down. 2.Call the hotel and obtain FOC for unused nights, note the booking accurately with the hotel staff member 's name, (if possible) the cancellation number, and the email address for the hotel manager or front desk. If you do not obtain FOC, take down hotel staff member's name and email address for the property. 3. Process a refund via the queue for the client of the unused nights and advise of the refund timeline (2-7 business days). | Slack​: NO | Refund Queue: YES | Create a Ticket: NO | Supervisor: NO

text: Hotel & Reservation Issues: Asking for a refund on "REFUND PROTECTION PLAN" | Instructions: If the guest requests for this plan to be cancelled and refunded, please click on void the policy and the refund will be processed automatically. text: When requesting FOC or Partial Unused Rooms: TEAK (Protecht) | You may not always get FOC so if the hotel denies FOC then ask for FOC minus first night penalty on multiple night reservations.: We will not be removing this when we are processing refunds | ** it's the hotel's industry standards to charge one night penalty on reservations: ** refunding RPP only when the guest asks for it to be removed
